main.description: Welcome to NECROMAGIC - a place where the secrets of dark magic become reality. We explore the ancient mysteries of sorcery, unveil the power of spells, and experiment with mystical rituals. In our laboratory, the most inquisitive minds come to learn, ready to touch the unknown.

experiments.title: NECROMANTIA
experiments.description: The study of connections with the afterlife.

experiments.title: SOUL ALCHEMY
experiments.description: The creation of elixirs and magical substances.

experiments.title: DARK ARTIFACTS
experiments.description: The study of cursed objects and the crafting of mystical tools.

experiments.title: SHADOW MAGIC
experiments.description: The mastery of shadows and dark energy.

experiments.title: BLOOD RUNES
experiments.description: The study of ancient sigils drawn with enchanted blood to unlock hidden powers and forbidden knowledge.

experiments.title: PHANTOM CONJURING
